entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
